# `medfiltThreshold` - Compute median-filtered adaptive threshold

## Syntax

```matlab
function threshold = medfiltThreshold(x, window, factor, maxthreshold)
threshold = medfiltThreshold(x, 5, 1.5, 1.5);
```

## Description
